unnormalised: Hey folks! Just when you thought Diwali mithai was the only thing burning a hole in your pocket, guess what? Gas cylinder prices are up again!
normalised: Hey folks! Just when you thought Diwali mithai was the only thing burning a hole in your pocket, guess what? Gas cylinder prices are up again!

unnormalised: Yup, your friendly neighbourhood Indane guy might be bringing more than just a delivery next time. Sources say that domestic LPG cylinders in Delhi are now costing around Rs. 1150, a jump of Rs. 50!
normalised: Yup, your friendly neighborhood Indane guy might be bringing more than just a delivery next time. Sources say that domestic L P G cylinders in Delhi are now costing around rupees one thousand one hundred and fifty, a jump of rupees fifty!

unnormalised: "It's the sarkar again!" exclaimed Mrs. Sharma from Karol Bagh, clearly not thrilled about having to shell out more for her Diwali feast preps. "How will we manage our budget now?"
normalised: "It's the sarkar again!" exclaimed Missus Sharma from Karol Bagh, clearly not thrilled about having to shell out more for her Diwali feast preps. "How will we manage our budget now?"

unnormalised: Dr. Verma, an economist from JNU, says, "Global crude oil prices are the culprit, impacting everything from petrol to LPG."
normalised: Doctor Verma, an economist from J N U, says, "Global crude oil prices are the culprit, impacting everything from petrol to L P G."

unnormalised: Meanwhile, commercial cylinders used by restaurants are seeing an even steeper hike, potentially affecting the price of your favourite samosa. Imagine, 25 sq ft of pure fried goodness getting more expensive!
normalised: Meanwhile, commercial cylinders used by restaurants are seeing an even steeper hike, potentially affecting the price of your favorite samosa. Imagine, twenty five square feet of pure fried goodness getting more expensive!

unnormalised: Analysts at ICICI Securities predict further fluctuations in the coming months. So keep an eye out, and maybe consider dusting off that old chulha just in case! Kidding (mostly)!
normalised: Analysts at I C I C I Securities predict further fluctuations in the coming months. So keep an eye out, and maybe consider dusting off that old chulha just in case! Kidding (mostly)!
